content: hibiscus afghan square by julie yeager for the moogly 2025 afghan block cal see mooglyblog com for all patterns 12 afghan block u s crochet terms crochet hook size j 6 0 mm materials red heart with love 100% acrylic #4 7 oz/198 g 370 yds/338 m color a bluebell color b pewter beg - beginning blo - back loop only chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet fpdc - front post double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip sl - slip space - space st - stitch 3rd loop - third loop tlo - third loop only treble_crochet - treble_crochet yo - yarn over notes chain-2 or chain-3 at the beginning of a round counts as a stitch chain-1 at the beginning of a round does not count as a stitch omitting last stitches means that those stitches were already completed at the beginning of the round copyright 2025 julie yeager designs see all at www julieyeagerdesigns com or my ravelry store contact me via e-mail at julieyeagerdesigns@gmail com cluster - cluster of 3 double_crochet to final step three times yo and pull through 4 loops beg cluster - beginning cluster of 3 chain 2 double_crochet to final step twice yo and pull through 3 loops decrease - double_crochet two stitches together yo double_crochet to last step in next st twice yo pull through all 3 loops on hook fptr2tog in round 12- front post treble two stitches together makes an inverted v yo twice insert hook from right to left around post of fpdc below in round 9 yo and pull through 4 loops on hook yo and pull through two loops twice 2 loops on hook yo twice insert hook from right to left around post of fpdc below and to the left in round 9 yo and pull through 5 loops on hook yo and pull through two loops twice 3 loops on hook yo and pull through all 3 loops third loop only tlo - three dimensional effect is made by stitching into the third loop rather than into the two loops of the stitch as normal the third loop is located directly behind the two loops if you do not wish to use this stitch try stitching into blo or stitch into normal two loops for a less textured look it may help to use a smaller hook especially when working into single_crochet round 1 with color a chain 4 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring beg cluster chain 2 cluster seven times chain 2 slip_stitch to top of beg cluster fasten_off 8 cluster 8 chain-2 space round 2 join color b with a double_crochet in any chain-2 space 3 double_crochet in same space 4 double_crochet in next chain-2 space seven times slip_stitch to first double_crochet fasten_off 32 double_crochet round 3 join color a with a single_crochet in first double_crochet of any 4-double_crochet group single_crochet in next 3 st fpdc around cluster below in round 1 single_crochet in next 4
